src:
BPS Catat Inflasi Oktober 0,02%
01 Nov 2019, 02:10 by Danang Sugianto


Foto: Ari Saputra

Jakarta - Badan Pusat Statistik (BPS) mencatat inflasi Oktober sebesar 0,02%. Inflasi terjadi di 82 kota IHK yang disurvei BPS."Hasil pemantauan di 82 lokasi menunjukkan di Oktober terjadi inflasi 0,02%," kata Kepala BPS Suhariyanto dalam jumpa pers di kantornya, Jakarta Pusat, Jumat (1/11/2019).Terjadinya inflasi 0,02% di Oktober membuat inflasi tahun kalender Januari-Oktober menjadi 2,22%. Sedangkan secara tahunan atau year on year (yoy) sebesar 3,13%."Inflasi tahun kalender Januari-Oktober 2,22% dan yoy sebesar 3,13%," ujarnya.Dari 82 kota yang disurvei, 43 di antaranya mengalami inflasi dan 39 deflasi. Inflasi tertinggi terjadi di Manado 1,22% dan deflasi terendah di Balikpapan 0,69%.Simak Video "Imbas Hiperinflasi, Warga Venezuela Beli BBM Pakai Rokok"[Gambas:Video 20detik](ara/eds)
text:
BPS Records October 0.02% Inflation
01 Nov 2019, 02:10 by Danang Sugianto


Photo: Ari Saputra

Jakarta - The Central Statistics Agency (BPS) recorded October inflation of 0.02%. Inflation occurred in 82 CPI cities surveyed by BPS. "Monitoring results in 82 locations showed 0.02% inflation in October," BPS Head Suhariyanto said at a press conference at his office, Central Jakarta, Friday (11/01/2019). 0.02% inflation in October brought January-October calendar year inflation to 2.22%. While the annual or year on year (yoy) was 3.13%. "January-October calendar year inflation was 2.22% and yoy was 3.13%," he said. Of the 82 cities surveyed, 43 of them experienced inflation and 39 deflation. The highest inflation occurred in Manado 1.22% and the lowest deflation in Balikpapan 0.69%. Watch the video "Impact of Hyperinflation, Venezuelans Buy Fuel Using Cigarettes" [Gambas: Video 20 seconds] (fig / eds)
